description: This file defines a VoyageAIEmbedder class that integrates with the voyageai API to generate embeddings from text. It includes methods for creating a client, requesting embeddings, and retrieving embedding data along with usage statistics.

classes.name: VoyageAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class that extends Embedder to provide text embedding functionality using the voyageai API.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Property that initializes and returns the voyageai client instance.

methods.name: _response
methods.description: Internal method to send a request to the voyageai API and get an EmbeddingsObject response.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Method to retrieve the embedding vector for a given text.

methods.name: get_embedding_and_usage
methods.description: Method to retrieve the embedding vector and usage statistics for a given text.
